mapper.select: select a.employee_no, a.employee_id, a.employee_pw, a.employee_name, a.employee_phone, a.employee_email, a.employee_addr, a.employee_team, a.employee_admin, a.manage_no, b.manage from employee as a join manage as b where a.manage_no = b.manage_no and a.employee_id = #{id} and a.employee_pw = #{pw};
